HomePage.text3: The accomplishments I have achieved so far.
HomePage.react: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Known for its component-based structure, virtual DOM speed, and reusability.
HomePage.next: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Known for its component-based structure, virtual DOM speed, and reusability.
HomePage.python: A powerful and secure Python web framework. It provides rapid development, database integration, an admin panel, and modularity.

AboutPage.title: About Me
AboutPage.text: Hi! I’m Javohir — 15 years old and very passionate about programming. I mainly code in Python, C++, and JavaScript, and I’m especially strong in backend.
AboutPage.text2: I build web applications with Django and FastAPI, have experience creating Telegram bots, and also do frontend using React and Next.js. Currently, I work as a freelancer and share interesting programming content on my YouTube and Telegram channels.
